title: Letters to the Editor:  Better Than 'Read the Label'
text:
Regarding Matthew Rees's review of "The End of Craving" (Bookshelf, Nov. 4): While health pundits tell us to "read the labels," I tell my cardiology patients to eat food that requires no label. An apple looks like an apple and Oreos don't grow on trees.

John Miller, M.D.

Fairway, Kan.
